title: Potential effects of soil petroleum contamination on decomposition of Artemisia annua plant litter
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00096J, Paper
Jiahao Li, Kaixuan Liu, Yuxin Dong, Lingsu Chen, Ziquan Wang, Jinqiang Chen, Xiaoxi Zhang
Artemisia annua litter produced in soil contaminated with 15 and 30 g kgâˆ’1 of petroleum exhibited significantly lower decomposition rates than that from uncontaminated soil.
